maturity_analysis.description: Evaluation of stability, SLAs, and enterprise readiness.

integration_quality.description: Assessment of SDKs, ecosystem, and versatility.

technical_score.description: Score based purely on quality/features. -10 (B worse) to +10 (B better).

technical_reasoning.description: A detailed, Markdown-formatted narrative explaining the technical comparison, scores, and trade-offs. Do not use bullet points.

lockin_score.description: Score based on vendor lock-in. -10 (high lock-in) to +10 (low lock-in).

lockin_reasoning.description: Explanation of the lock-in score, considering factors like proprietary APIs, data portability, and open standards.
